scripts.say: The Jewel of Calabria... is this beautiful sea itself?
The sea, illuminated by the glow of the pale moonlight, glimmered like a blue gemstone.

The ruins of ancient civilizations swaying like mirages along the shore, and the lifegiving waters that birthed a home for so many people... The breathtaking scenery was almost a spiritual experience.
"The Coast of the Gods," they call it, as well as the Jewel of Calabria. This is Sardegna's national treasure.
This is the cradle that nurtured countless peoples, civilizations, and legends over thousands of years.
Indeed, this is a treasure that is as resplendent as you and I being together, beautiful signora.
(Uhh... that last line didn't seem necessary...)
Would you two mind telling me why you came here?
We've come to make a wager. Between the Iron Blood's machinations and the Royal Navy's strength.
Though we are a part of the Crimson Axis, we wish to ascertain what we mean to them.
Will this battle become their "Reenactment," or will it become the first page of a new future?
Of course, we are still interested in spreading the glory of Sardegna.
But now that all the actors are assembled, the objectives of this play shall be revealed.
Everything was for the sake of preserving the sanctity of this jewel.
The Royal Navy has always held the power to ensure the safety and stability of the Mediterranean. Why not just negotiate with Her Majesty?
The Iron Blood have become more powerful than us... No, stronger than you can possibly imagine. In due time, we would be swallowed by their darkness.
That is the purpose of our wager here. If your Royal Navy falls here, what chance to do you stand against the Iron Blood and their Siren masters?
So we've finally reached a mutual understanding, huh...
Star-crossed ships bound by fate to battle... The lamentations of a sea ablaze... The girls dancing like puppets across countless "Reenactments..." But at last...
"Res, non verba." All these obstacles you put in our way are parts of your "wager," correct?
Let me ask you then. Should we stop you here and prove that we are capable of protecting the Mediterranean, would you rejoin the Azur Lane?
Yes. As flagship of the Imperial Fleet, you have my word.
Very well. Barham, Valiant, let us fight for the glory of Her Majesty.
Formidable, I'll leave air support in your hands.
Of course. You can count on me.
Is your sister not coming?
Illustrious is on a little side trip to the Aegean, where she's putting an end to the Sirens there. She said it wouldn't be fair to put you up against the entire Illustrious-class.
Alas, what a pity. And here I thought I'd get to see all three goddesses of the Royal Navy in their swimsuits~
Ahem...!
Zara, Pola, and all members of the Sardegna Fleet. This is our time. Allow the light of Sardegna to shine!
